channel.title: Question: about portals
channel.description:
ok..lets say i have a normal portal..how do i make it when u click on it,it adds items...
i tryed to just put an additem command type thing to it.. this is what im wanting the portal to do.
You click on it and get : Lavastaff(s):1 - Nature(s): 1000 - Fire(s):1000 - Magic Longbow(s):1000
so what should i do? ive tryed a few things but all become errors..im pretty sure i start with:
[code]case 2468:[/code]
someone help please?

item.title: Question: about portals
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

its pretty much the same as teleporting…

case 2468:
addItem(6570, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
teleportToX = 3096;
teleportToY = 3502;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“You teleport 2 edgy and get some items :)”);
break;

i belive thats how it wuld look like
oh and of course, change stuff around like the coords and item ids

Read full topic

item.title: Question: about portals
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_tom 0wn3r tom
item.description:
@0wn3r_tom wrote:

i dont know with portals, but you can make a object like a statue and when you click on in you get the stuff

Read full topic
